resources.string:
Hi!, my name is Olaore Fouad
 I really do not know a lot about what I like or don't. But if anything is dear to me, it's my family.
 They mean the world to me, and I can do anything for them. They keep pushing mentally, and they keep giving me a reason to keep learning.

 I also love eating food, people call me Foodie too. Not because of my eating habits, but because my first name is: Fouad. Get it.

 I am also a developer of amazing applications. All of which are on my emulator, or on my browser history

 If you know₀ you know₀
